text: Porocephalida is an order of tongue worms containing two superfamilies, with four families in them. Some species in this order, such as Armillifer grandis, have been found in vipers, with some found in vipers from bushmeat markets. == Superfamilies and families == * Linguatuloidea ** Linguatulidae ** Subtriquetridae * Porocephaloidea ** Porocephalidae ** Sebekidae == References == Category:Crustacean orders
title: Porocephalida
